items.sentence: I know it\'s highly unlikely that I\'ll be able to convince you that you\'re wrong.
I know that it\'s highly unlikely I\'ll be able to convince you that you\'re wrong.
Tom had never had time to read anything other than textbooks when he was a student.
Tom can\'t quite believe Mary is really going on a date with him this Friday night.
If you could share a meal with any three people, living or dead, who would they be?
At that time, Tom didn't know that Mary was the one he'd eventually get married to.
Experts say coffee prices are rising mainly because people are willing to pay more.
He seems to have a habit of getting on his coworker's back when he makes a mistake.
She got so carried away listening to the Beatles that she missed the date with him.
It's hard to learn to speak a language if you don't have any opportunity to use it.
